mapper.select: SELECT sc.id, products.id productId, sc.product_number productNumber, products.title, products.image, products.weight, products.selling_price sellingPrice FROM shopping_cart sc LEFT JOIN products ON sc.product_id = products.id AND products.is_valid = 1 WHERE sc.user_id = #{agentId}

SELECT sc.id, products.id productId, sc.product_number productNumber, products.title, products.image, products.weight, products.selling_price sellingPrice, ap.price AS agentPrice FROM shopping_cart sc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ap.product_id, ap.price FROM agent_products ap WHERE ap.agent_user_id = #{agentUserId} ) ap ON sc.product_id = ap.product_id LEFT JOIN products ON sc.product_id = products.id AND products.is_valid = 1 WHERE sc.user_id = #{userId}
